price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲߬ߓߊ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߡߊ߫ ߟߴߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫߸ ߝߏ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ߜߙߊ߬ߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illā wahum mush'rikūna
